title: Inside Europe 28.04.2022
description: Russia cuts off gas to Poland and Bulgaria, Ukrainian mayors appeal for reconstruction aid, and elections in France and Slovenia – we look at what the results might mean. Also on Inside Europe: leading lawyer Philippe Sands on prosecuting Putin for the crime of aggression, a look at the dilemmas facing Turkey’s drone industry and an evening in the company of Kyiv’s courageous symphony orchestra.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Kate Laycock, Philippe Sands, Vitali Klitschko, Teri Schulz, French elections, Slowenia, Freedom Party,  Drones, Inside Europe
